name: ThrustWorthy
description: Navigate through a level using your jetpack! Use arrow keys and space to move, jump and boost with your jetpack (yes, it's a jetpack, the character just turned their back to us, ok?). Avoid traps and refuel at the red barrels. Press R to restart at any time. Spoiler alert: use the flames from your jetpack to destroy traps, but don't use it near the barrels, as this will make them explode.
